column11:
Can I download the file to make personal changes?
I want to avoid people uploading different versions of this file with similar
look than TK8's Library, to avoid confusion as to which is the original
So, for the time being, download is disabled

Could you include okizeme information?
The document is supposed to be a basic, so people can just pick a character up
have fun with them and later decide if they want to master them
Okizeme can be complicated and specific, so I don't plan to include
this information
Aug 22: Currently travelling. I'll finish Lili's guide when I get back.

column7: Tornado caused by previous move. Often requires a dash afterwards to continue the combo.
column11: Sep 11: EDDY's guide is up to date
Sep 26: Long time no see! I just updated VICTOR's guide.

column7: When a notation is inside brackets, it means those hits must be blocked or whiffed.
"While standing". Input must be done as the character is standing up.
Input must be done while character is crouching.
Heat must be active to be able to perform the mentioned move or access Heat Dash property.
Buttons must be pressed together. For example, 1+2 would mean pushing both punches.
Done by pressing "df" during an incoming low attack.
